message.content: What is your Minecraft username? Type just your in-game name with no spaces. Capitalization does matter.

Got it, I'll hold onto that! Let me fill you in on few things you should know about the server. You will have to go through each of my messages to join Darnoc Realms. (It shouldn't take long.)
Type `okay` to continue

One of the most useful things on the Darnoc Realms Discord server is a channel named #ingame-chat that relays and sends all messages from the chat in-game on the Minecraft server. It also sends messages whenever players join or leave the Minecraft server! Mentions and images should work!
Type `okay` to continue

Another useful feature on Darnoc Realms is the online map. It shows all of the chunks in the world that have been explored as well as player's live locations. 
Type `okay` to continue

When you join for the first time, you will spawn in the farming village instead of the world spawn. It contains a hospitable house by the river that is open to anyone to sleep in. Additionally, there are multiple farms that anyone can use. If you are unsure if a farm is public, look for signs and ask on Discord.
Type `okay` to continue

The actual world spawn is on a small island called "Spawn Island" at coordinates [-2728, 20]. That island is surrounded by a larger one called "Community Island." Community Island is the place for everyone to meet, shop, and partake in events. No houses, bases, farms, or lag inducing redstone contraptions can be built on Community Island. The island is at the coordinates [-2800, 0] and is visible from Spawn Island. All shops should be built on Community Island unless the shop must be in a different location for it's purpose. Company/club headquarters can also be built on the community island.
Type `okay` to continue

After getting your footing, you may want to leave the farming village to build a base or house. It is recommended that you find a suitable spot on the online map (https://darnoc-realms.ml/map) and checking if other players are in the area before building. If another player has already started building nearby (within about 150 blocks) it is your responsibility to contact them to work out an agreement.

While exploring the server you may come across another player's base or home. Treat that land as private and only go inside it with explicit permission. If you would like to allow anyone to enter your base, post a message in the #location-feed channel.

Type `okay` to continue

This server has block locking so you can keep your most prized possessions safe!

Use the `/htm set PRIVATE` command to lock a block.
Use the `/htm set PUBLIC` command to make a block available to everyone but only destroyable and lockable by you.
Use the `/htm info` command to check if a block is locked.
Use the `/htm trust <PLAYER NAME HERE>` command to make a block that you set to PRIVATE available to a certain person.
 Use the `/htm remove` command to remove all the settings from a block.

Here is a video where all the features are used, https://i.imgur.com/MPIt7Cw.mp4
Type `okay` to continue

On Darnoc Realms, once one player sleeps, the night is skipped for everyone! A message will be sent in the chat letting everyone know who slept. This is especially useful when some players are AFKing and you want to sleep.
Type `okay` to continue

Animals and mobs have a chance of dropping their head when they are killed. This chance is increased with the Looting enchantment. A sometimes up-to-date list of the drop rates can be found here, https://reddit.com/g1t9hj.
Type `okay` to continue

Thanks for learning about Darnoc Realms! You'll be prepared when you first join. Now we have to wait 24 hours since when you joined the Discord server. After that, I'll make you a member and ping you to let you know. Also, I'll give you the server IP address and whitelist you. See you soon! (You can check how much time you have left by messaging me anything.)
